synopsis.text:
Dice, friendship, and a world of unexplored fun await Miki Takekasa, a reserved high school student who struggles to comprehend the true essence of enjoyment. When the dynamic Aya Takayashiki enters her life, the two embark on a journey of discovery that leads them to the enchanting Saikoro Club, a board game store hidden in the heart of Kyoto.

As the pair delve into the intriguing realm of board games, they stumble upon Midori Oono, their class representative, who works at the store. Guided by Midori, Miki and Aya find themselves immersed in a German board game, sparking an unexpected joy that Miki has never experienced before.

In the blossoming spring of Kyoto, the girls' lives take a delightful turn as they explore the captivating world of board games after school. With each new game, they forge new friendships and create cherished memories, finally uncovering the 'fun' that Miki has been yearning for all along. Join these high school girls as they navigate the thrilling labyrinth of board games, friendship, and self-discovery in the enchanting city of Kyoto.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
